27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sahl bim Mu'adh bin Anas Al-Juhani narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Whoever suppresses his rage while he is able to unleash it, Allah will call him before the heads (leaders) of creation on the Day of Judgement, so that he can inform Him of which of the Hur he would like

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Suppressing One's Rage
